identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Quiet Luxury' digital experience for Desideri di Puglia that feels like a sun-drenched Puglian afternoon—warm, historic, and exclusive.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix historic stone aesthetics with modern Swiss precision.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a 'welcome home'.
Content is King: The rooms are the heroes; the UI is the frame.
Negative Space: Luxury is the absence of clutter.
Contrast: Deep sea blues against warm limestone.

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-heading tracking-tight leading-none text-primary
usage.h2: text-3xl md:text-5xl font-heading tracking-tight text-primary mb-8
usage.caption: text-xs font-accent uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-accent-foreground/70

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Italiana&family=Manrope:wght@200;300;400;500;600&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,500;0,600;1,400&display=swap');

grid_systems.bento_gallery: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8 auto-rows-[300px]

buttons.base: rounded-none px-8 py-4 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all duration-300
buttons.primary: bg-adriatic-blue text-white hover:bg-antique-gold hover:text-white shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-adriatic-blue text-adriatic-blue hover:bg-adriatic-blue hover:text-white

cards.room_card: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-500 border border-puglia-stone/50
cards.feature_card: p-8 bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/20 hover:bg-white transition-colors

navigation.header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 transition-all duration-300 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-puglia-stone/30

inputs.base: rounded-none border-b border-puglia-stone bg-transparent px-0 py-2 focus:border-adriatic-blue focus:ring-0 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

rules.scroll: Implement Lenis for smooth, weighted scrolling.
rules.reveal: Use 'whileInView' with a slow ease-out (duration: 0.8s) for sections.
rules.hover: Images should scale slightly (1.05) on hover with a long duration (0.6s).

hero.usage: Full screen hero background with overlay

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font. Use the specified font stack.
DO NOT use standard Bootstrap/Material shadows. Use subtle, large blurs.
DO NOT center everything. Use asymmetry to create tension.
Images must be optimized and lazy-loaded.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a luxury B&B website. Focus on 'Quiet Luxury'. Use the provided color palette and typography strictly. The 'Stanza della Nonna' and 'Stanza del Pozzo' are the core products—showcase them with large, high-quality imagery. The booking flow should be seamless. Use the 'bento' grid for the gallery. Implement the admin panel with a clean, functional dashboard style (Archetype 4).
